information.role: Developed with MarCom Group: creative directors Curtis Nelson & Bryan Clark, designers Bryan Clark, Carolyn Belefski, Soon Ham, & Jerel Motos, senior developer Matthew Brackney
information.description: The main site features plenty of CSS3 and JavaScript animation, including a 3D cube slider (Matt), a sectioned slider (Matt and I), a flipping portfolio section with directional hovers (I), and a horizontal accordion (Matt). The mobile version features an off-screen slide-in navigation.
information.mediaDetail: JavaScript animation using greensock.js, HTML5 video with IE support using video.js, cookies, JavaScript mobile detection.
